rukus.text: sabbaha lillahi ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi wahuwa l-ʿazizu l-hakimu
yaayyuha alladhina amanu lima taquluna ma la tafʿaluna
kabura maqtan ʿinda l-lahi an taqulu ma la tafʿaluna
inna l-laha yuhibbu alladhina yuqatiluna fi sabilihi saffan ka-annahum bun'yanun marsusun
wa-idh qala musa liqawmihi yaqawmi lima tu'dhunani waqad taʿlamuna anni rasulu l-lahi ilaykum falamma zaghu azagha l-lahu qulubahum wal-lahu la yahdi l-qawma l-fasiqina

wa-idh qala ʿisa ub'nu maryama yabani is'raila inni rasulu l-lahi ilaykum musaddiqan lima bayna yadayya mina l-tawrati wamubashiran birasulin yati min baʿdi us'muhu ahmadu falamma jaahum bil-bayinati qalu hadha sih'run mubinun
waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ʿala l-lahi l-kadhiba wahuwa yud'ʿa ila l-is'lami wal-lahu la yahdi l-qawma l-zalimina
yuriduna liyut'fiu nura l-lahi bi-afwahihim wal-lahu mutimmu nurihi walaw kariha l-kafiruna
huwa alladhi arsala rasulahu bil-huda wadini l-haqi liyuz'hirahu ʿala l-dini kullihi walaw kariha l-mush'rikuna
